This folder is a template for peptide microarray analysis, it contains a report with default settings that should fit the most common analysis. Some of the parameters can be changed by modifying the configuration file. However, for a more customized analysis, the packages cannot be replaced by this report alone and should be used in a regular interactive session.

Setting up the report:
	(Putting data at the right place)

Running the report:
	(knit)

Retrieving the results:
	(data output - Although most of it will be described in the report)

Changing parameters in config file:
	(writing in config.yaml)
